name: Don't Fall Far
description:
In platformer games, you usually don't care about dropping off of ledges.

But in this game, you will.

Whenever you are falling, your energy will drain, if it empties, you fail.

Good luck. 

Made for the Indie Teens Game Jam.

Controls:

A,D- Move (In menu and in game)

Space- Jump (In game)

Enter- Select (In Menu)

Esc- Exit Level (In game)
